00013 class StiDetector;
00014 class StiMaterial;
00015 class StiShape;

00017 // Set up stl maps for by-name lookup of shapes and materials.
00018 // Not used for placements because they are unique to each detector.
00019 typedef map<NameMapKey, StiMaterial*> materialMap;
00020 typedef materialMap::value_type materialMapValType;
00021 
00022 typedef map<NameMapKey, StiShape*> shapeMap;
00023 typedef shapeMap::value_type shapeMapValType;
00024 
00025 typedef map<NameMapKey, StiDetector*> detectorMap;
00026 typedef detectorMap::const_iterator detectorIterator;
00027 typedef detectorMap::value_type detectorMapValType;
00028 
00029 class StiDetectorBuilder{
00030 
00031 public:
00032     // constructors
00033     StiDetectorBuilder();
00034     virtual ~StiDetectorBuilder(); 
00035 
00036     virtual void init() = 0;
00037 
00038     // accessors
00039     detectorMap getDetectors(){ return mDetectorMap; }
00040 
00041     virtual StiMaterial *findMaterial(const string& szName) const;
00042     virtual StiShape    *findShape(const string& szName) const;
00043     virtual StiDetector *findDetector(const string& szName) const;
00044 
00045     // mutators
00046 
00047     // iterators
00048     bool hasMore() const;
00049     void fillNext(StiDetector *detector);
00050     
00051 protected:
00052     
00053     virtual void buildMaterials() = 0;
00054     virtual void buildShapes() = 0;
00055     virtual void buildDetectors() = 0;
00056 
00057     materialMap         mMaterialMap;
00058     shapeMap            mShapeMap;
00059     detectorMap         mDetectorMap;
00060     detectorIterator    mDetectorIterator;

00062 };
